summary: Heal your disease with a spell
descriptionHtml:
Months of dedication, and research I finally did it.

I duplicated a spell once forgotten, once gifted to the Nord healers at the chapels.
What\'s a few broken bones... And removed livers?

The spell I created will cure disease with the slightest ease. Although there is a slight set back... It takes a few moments to cast, and well there\'s the fact that it uses 90 Majika points... ( Ahem )

-------------------------------------------------------------------------
Translations :

Russian : http://modgames.net/load/277-1-0-11265


Balanced and lore friendly, my friends I present to you the Cure disease spell.
I wrote down my findings and put them in a dead drop at Riverwood.

The dead drop is located underneath a hand cart just past the entrance arched by watchtowers... Happy hunting

-------------------------------------------------------------------------

Version 1.0  includes :

Cure all diseases perfectly
No hand graphics ( Working on that )
Spell inventory graphics
Spell tome
Balanced

Version 2.0 includes :

Expert level cure disease
Hand graphics
400 Majika cost with 3second casting time
-----------------------------------------------------------------------

Any comments, requests or suggestions please don\'t hesitate to speak them. Please be constructive, though
author: Misa
